speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: ACT V

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: SCENE I. KING JOHN'S palace.

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Enter KING JOHN, CARDINAL PANDULPH, and Attendants

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: Thus have I yielded up into your hand

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: The circle of my glory.

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: Giving the crown

speaker: CARDINAL PANDULPH
text_entry: Take again

speaker: CARDINAL PANDULPH
text_entry: From this my hand, as holding of the pope

speaker: CARDINAL PANDULPH
text_entry: Your sovereign greatness and authority.

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: Now keep your holy word: go meet the French,

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: And from his holiness use all your power

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: To stop their marches 'fore we are inflamed.

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: Our discontented counties do revolt;

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: Our people quarrel with obedience,

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: Swearing allegiance and the love of soul

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: To stranger blood, to foreign royalty.

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: This inundation of mistemper'd humour

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: Rests by you only to be qualified:

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: Then pause not; for the present time's so sick,

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: That present medicine must be minister'd,

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: Or overthrow incurable ensues.

speaker: CARDINAL PANDULPH
text_entry: It was my breath that blew this tempest up,

speaker: CARDINAL PANDULPH
text_entry: Upon your stubborn usage of the pope;

speaker: CARDINAL PANDULPH
text_entry: But since you are a gentle convertite,

speaker: CARDINAL PANDULPH
text_entry: My tongue shall hush again this storm of war

speaker: CARDINAL PANDULPH
text_entry: And make fair weather in your blustering land.

speaker: CARDINAL PANDULPH
text_entry: On this Ascension-day, remember well,

speaker: CARDINAL PANDULPH
text_entry: Upon your oath of service to the pope,

speaker: CARDINAL PANDULPH
text_entry: Go I to make the French lay down their arms.

speaker: CARDINAL PANDULPH
text_entry: Exit

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: Is this Ascension-day? Did not the prophet

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: Say that before Ascension-day at noon

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: My crown I should give off? Even so I have:

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: I did suppose it should be on constraint:

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: But, heaven be thank'd, it is but voluntary.

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: Enter the BASTARD

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: All Kent hath yielded; nothing there holds out

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: But Dover castle: London hath received,

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Like a kind host, the Dauphin and his powers:

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Your nobles will not hear you, but are gone

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: To offer service to your enemy,

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: And wild amazement hurries up and down

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: The little number of your doubtful friends.

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: Would not my lords return to me again,

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: After they heard young Arthur was alive?

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: They found him dead and cast into the streets,

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: An empty casket, where the jewel of life

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: By some damn'd hand was robb'd and ta'en away.

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: That villain Hubert told me he did live.

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: So, on my soul, he did, for aught he knew.

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: But wherefore do you droop? why look you sad?

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Be great in act, as you have been in thought;

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Let not the world see fear and sad distrust

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Govern the motion of a kingly eye:

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Be stirring as the time; be fire with fire;

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Threaten the threatener and outface the brow

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Of bragging horror: so shall inferior eyes,

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: That borrow their behaviors from the great,

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Grow great by your example and put on

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: The dauntless spirit of resolution.

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Away, and glister like the god of war,

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: When he intendeth to become the field:

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Show boldness and aspiring confidence.

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: What, shall they seek the lion in his den,

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: And fright him there? and make him tremble there?

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: O, let it not be said: forage, and run

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: To meet displeasure farther from the doors,

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: And grapple with him ere he comes so nigh.

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: The legate of the pope hath been with me,

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: And I have made a happy peace with him;

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: And he hath promised to dismiss the powers

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: Led by the Dauphin.

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: O inglorious league!

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Shall we, upon the footing of our land,

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Send fair-play orders and make compromise,

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Insinuation, parley and base truce

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: To arms invasive? shall a beardless boy,

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: A cocker'd silken wanton, brave our fields,

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: And flesh his spirit in a warlike soil,

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Mocking the air with colours idly spread,

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: And find no cheque? Let us, my liege, to arms:

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Perchance the cardinal cannot make your peace;

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Or if he do, let it at least be said

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: They saw we had a purpose of defence.

speaker: KING JOHN
text_entry: Have thou the ordering of this present time.

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Away, then, with good courage! yet, I know,

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Our party may well meet a prouder foe.

speaker: BASTARD
text_entry: Exeunt
